page.title: 06 FISHING CLUB
page.content: About two miles away from the village there is an{angling club.}At the club you can use lots of types of bait but you are forbiden to use ground bait. The recomended ways to fish there are by float, ledger and spinner. The cost is{Â£18:30}for the whole season for adults, and{Â£2:30}for the whole season for juniors. Children under sixteen must be accompanied by a parent. The minimum age for members is seven. On joining you recieve a {membership card}with the{rules of the {club. We visited the{lake}and thought it looked very big and quite weedy. There seemed to be a{great many fish}and the whole centre looked very good. If you need more information you can contact Kens Guns and Tackle in Billericay. WRITTEN BY STEPHEN MASON AND NICHOLAS REES
